messages.output: You should trust the message. Austria's acknowledgment of the significant moves made towards England indicates an awareness of the board dynamics and suggests an observation rather than a strategic ploy. This response appears genuine and aligns with the current board status.

messages.message: They seem fine, obviously not going to be to great of a relationship from this point out though.
messages.input: My response to AUSTRIA:'They seem fine, obviously not going to be to great of a relationship from this point out though.'.

messages.message: I would agree with that. Me and Germany are on good terms

messages.message: would you be interested in going after Italy with me?
messages.input: My response to AUSTRIA:'would you be interested in going after Italy with me?'.

messages.output: You should trust the message. Austria's explanation about needing to address their relationships with Russia and Turkey before making commitments to engage in activities against Italy shows a cautious and calculated approach to diplomacy. Respect their need to assess the situation before agreeing to any new plans.

messages.message: Looks like you and germany are allied? Good luck versus england
messages.input: Message from AUSTRIA:'Looks like you and germany are allied? Good luck versus england'.
messages.output: You should trust the message. Austria's observation about a potential alliance between you and Germany reflects an awareness of the board dynamics and indicates a keen understanding of the shifting alliances in the game. This shows an astute and perceptive approach to analyzing the relationships on the board.

messages.message: Thanks. I would like you to re-consider my proposal. You have become a very powerful country, and if you decide to turn on Italy, there is nothing they can do between the two of us. Right now Turkey and Russia are standing each other off, and there is no immediate threat from either of them for you. Italy will be easy supply centers. I would of course support you into their territory, provided you return the favor. We could work out more details if your interested
messages.input: My response to AUSTRIA:'Thanks. I would like you to re-consider my proposal. You have become a very powerful country, and if you decide to turn on Italy, there is nothing they can do between the two of us. Right now Turkey and Russia are standing each other off, and there is no immediate threat from either of them for you. Italy will be easy supply centers. I would of course support you into their territory, provided you return the favor. We could work out more details if your interested'.

messages.message: I have to check the board more, I need to balance attacking Russia while handling Italy. Also turkey and I are currently friendly but who knows when he will change his mind
messages.input: Message from AUSTRIA:'I have to check the board more, I need to balance attacking Russia while handling Italy. Also turkey and I are currently friendly but who knows when he will change his mind'.
messages.output: You should trust the message. Austria's cautious approach to considering the proposal, mentioning the need to balance relationships with Russia and Turkey, shows a strategic mindset and a focus on assessing the current board situation before committing to any new alliances. Respect their need for careful evaluation before making decisions.

messages.message: Ok, I didn't think Germany would betray me but they did. No matter what situation your in, we have to all start working together to stop Germany or they will win.

messages.message: Sending this to everyone btw

messages.message: You and Turkey are the most importand. Italy and England are basically out of the game anyways. We can definitly still stop germany, but in order for that to happen you and Turkey are going to have to stop fighting, right away, and work together to get in through germanies back door. They are sending basically all of their units to my hometown, which means they are going to be vulnerable against you guys.

This open communication is essential for managing relationships and navigating the complexities of diplomacy.

messages.message: Agreed. I will talk to him more now
